dataIdInfo.envirDesc: Microsoft Windows 7 Version 6.1 (Build 7601) Service Pack 1; Esri ArcGIS 10.5.1.7333

idCitation.collTitle: Montana Administrative Boundaries ArcGIS Server Map Service

dataIdInfo.idPurp: The Montana Weed Districts are a part of the Montana Spatial Data Infrastructure's Administrative Boundary Framework. These boundaries are to be used for the mapping or analysis of weed control/management districts. These boundaries are based on current Montana county boundary lines.
dataIdInfo.idAbs: Montana Weed Control Districts represent the boundaries for each district. Each County in Montana is statutoraly mandated to have a Weed Control Districts. Each district has a Weed Coordinator. These coordinators are in charge of helping citizen manage/control noxious weeds. This data has each Weed Coordinator listed along with website and contact information for the County Weed District. The legislation that oversees the creation, maintenance, or dissolution of this type of district can be found: http://leg.mt.gov/bills/mca_toc/7_11_10.htm. The weed districts are based on county boundaries. The weed district attribute information for this dataset was collected from the Montana Department of Agriculture's Noxious Weed Program. Websites available were found online. For more information on Weed Control in Montana please visit the Montana Weed Control Association: http://www.mtweed.org. For more information on the state of Montana Noxious Weed Program with the Montana Department of Agriculture: http://agr.mt.gov/agr/Programs/Weeds/
dataIdInfo.idCredit: Montana State Library, Montana Department of Agriculture

themeKeys.keyword: Montana Weed Districts, Weed Districts, Montana Administrative Boundaries; Montana Spatial Data Infrastructure, Montana Boundaries, Boundaries

usrDefFreq.duration: This data will be updated on an as needed basis and will be checked annually for updates; unless a GCDB enhancement is completed then the geometry will be updated to be coincident with Montana GCDB.

Consts.useLimit: The Montana State Library Geographic Information Services provides this product/service for informational purposes only. The Library did not produce it for, nor is it suitable for legal, engineering, or surveying purposes. Consumers of this information should review or consult the primary data and information sources to ascertain the viability of the information for their purposes. The Library provides these data in good faith and in no event, shall be liable for any incorrect results or analysis, any lost profits and special, indirect or consequential damages to any party, arising out of or in connection with the use or the inability to use the data or the services provided. The Library makes these data and services available as a convenience to the public, and for no other purpose. The Library reserves the right to change or revise published data and/or services at any time.

aggrDSName.resTitle: Montana Administrative Boundaries ArcGIS Server Map Service

attrdomv.udom: Sequential unique whole numbers that are automatically generated.

attr.attrdef: County Name the district is within
Name of the Weed District Coordinator
city portion of the mailing address for the weed control district office
phone number for the county weed controld district office
fax for the weed control district office
e-mail address for the County Weed Coordinator
website for the weed district, if not available, County Government website
ZIP code portion of the mailing address of the county weed control district office
Area of feature in internal units squared.

attrdomv.udom: Positive real numbers that are automatically generated.

usrDefFreq.duration: This metadata will be updated when appropriate.

prcStep.stepDesc: Geometry was taken from Montana Spatial Data Infrastructure's Administrative Boundary County Boundaries layer. The attribute information was researched online or received from the Department of Agriculture.
Adjusted weed district boundaries to the July 2015 CadNSDI Montana (PLSS)
Adjusted weed district boundaries to the March 2016 CadNSDI Montana (PLSS)
Adjusted weed district boundaries to the October 2017 CadNSDI Montana (PLSS) and renamed Lewis and Clark
Updated weed coordinator information from the Montana Weed Control Association web site: https://www.mtweed.org/weeds/weed-districts/
Updated contact information; Adjusted boundaries to the November 2018 CadNSDI Montana (PLSS)
